
```{r}
print_hello_world<-function(){
  return(print("Hello World"))
}
print_hello_world()
```

```{r}
return_input <- function(input){
  return(input)
}

 return_input(input = 5)

 return_input(5)

```

```{r}
add_one <- function(my_number){
  temp <- my_number + 1
    return(temp)
}

add_one(10)
```

```{r}
add_three <- function(value1,value2,value3){
  sum <- value1+value2+value3
  return(sum)
}
add_three(1,5,11)
```
